entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
